name: Kuldeep Vaishnav
title: Backend / Java / Spring Boot / Senior Software Engineer / Tech Lead
description: Backend-focused Java developer with 7 years of experience in building scalable microservices, payment systems, recruiter platforms, and enterprise applications.
about: Backend-focused Java developer with 7 years of experience in building scalable microservices, payment systems, recruiter platforms, and enterprise applications.
Strong expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, SQL, MongoDB, Kafka, and system design with experience leading teams and migrating legacy systems to modern architectures.
Experienced in designing high-availability systems, handling large-scale production issues, and improving performance across complex backend platforms.
